#  Iris Guzmán 

  [Print](https:window.print();)  [Feedback](https:void(0);)   [Share & Bookmark](https:void(0);)  Share & Bookmark, Press Enter to show all options, press Tab go to next option 

 *  [Email](https:void(0);) 
 *  [Facebook](https:shareLink('facebook')) 
 *  [LinkedIn](https:shareLink('linkedin')) 
 *  [Twitter](https:shareLink('twitter')) 
 *  [Reddit](https:shareLink('reddit')) 
  [Font Size:](https:void(0);)  [+](https:void(0);)  [-](https:void(0);)  

|![Iris Guzman Print Size (002)](https://www.seatacwa.gov/home/showpublishedimage/6517/637775833233570000)|## Deputy Mayor Iris Guzmán__Council Position #6 __      __Term: __ January 2022 - December 2025   __City Hall Phone: __  206.973.4800   __City Hall Mailing Address:__    4800 S. 188th Street, WA 98188-8605    __Cell Phone:__   206.247.8151   __Email:__   [iguzman@seatacwa.gov](mailto:iguzman@seatacwa.gov)     __City Council Group Email:__   [CityCouncil@seatacwa.gov](mailto:CityCouncil@seatacwa.gov)|
|---|---|

 

 Profession 

 * School Social Worker, Tukwila School District 2022 - 2024
 * School Social Worker, Highline Public Schools 2016 - 2022

 Civic 

 __City of SeaTac__ 

 * Deputy Mayor since January 9, 2024
 * Councilmember since January 1, 2022, position #6
 * First person of Latine descent to be a SeaTac City Councilmember
 *  Chair, Parks & Recreation Committee 
 * Member, Administration & Finance Committee
 * Sound Cities Association (SCA) Public Issues Committee (PIC) - past member
 * Certificate of Municipal Leadership

 __Other Associations__ 

 * Former Board Member - Para los Niños
 * Former Board and Founding member of La Barra Fuerza Verde
 * Member of the 33rd LD

 Personal

 * Proud resident of SeaTac since 2007.
 * Founding member of Sounders supporter Group: La Barra Fuerza Verde.
 * Speak Spanish-fluently
 *  Daughter of immigrant parents from Mexico. 
 * First in my family to attend and graduate college. and earn a master's degree
 * Social Worker since 2006.

 Education 

 * GNM - University of Washington Evans School of Public Policy and Governance
 * M.S.W. - University of Washington School of Social Work
 * Bachelor of Arts, Applied Sociology - Seattle University
 * Associate in Arts, General Education - Bellevue College

 [4800 South 188th StreetSeaTac, WA 98188-8605](https://www.seatacwa.gov/?splash=https://goo.gl/maps/1QJDkAMu9YP2&____isexternal=true) 

City Hall:206.973.4800

Community Center:206.973.4680
